series: Hua xia gui bao = -- Chinese splendors

by_statement: zhu bian Luo Weixuan ; Zhong wen bian zhuan Lin Ke, Liu Zhengheng, Luo Weixuan ; Ying wen Zou Xiandao ; zheng ti she ji Lin Jianping = Panorama of China's world heritage.
